parameters:
\N<Ryuda Soldier>As a life-prolonging measure for your husband who is
imprisoned, you are obligated to pay gold every 5 days
during the training period.

\N<Ryuda Soldier>The amount you are required to pay this time is \C[1][1500
MO]\C[0].
\N<Ryuda Soldier>Are you prepared to make the payment this time?\$

\N<Ryuda Soldier>Hmm... indeed. You have worked hard; it would be good for
you to continue to do so.

\N<Ryuda Soldier>However... should you stop the payments out of self-
preservation, we will simply carry out the sentence
methodically.

\N<Ryuda Soldier>What's this? You also do not have enough money on hand to
meet the conditions.

\N<Ryuda Soldier>What's wrong? Silence won't start anything. Do what you must
do.

\N<Ryuda Soldier>...I see. I understand everything. It seems you were not up
to the task after all.

\N<Segi>W-wait, please! If you could just wait a little longer, I
will definitely have the money...!

\N<Ryuda Soldier>You have already been given ample time. There will be no
further leniency.

\N<Ryuda Soldier>Come. I said you were not up to the task, but fortunately,
it seems you still have some value to us.

\N<Ryuda Soldier>Your husband Yuia's temporary exemption has already been
approved. All that's left is for you yourself to take the
stage at the military training assembly.

\N<Segi>...I can't run away. For Yuia-sama's sake... for Riia's
sake. I have to do this...

\N<Training Troops Receptionist>The training session is currently being held inside. Those
who are not participants cannot proceed any further.
\N<Segi>I've come today... to fight in the training troops assembly.

\N<Training Troops Receptionist>Hmm... you've arrived. This is your third battle today. I
must commend you for showing up without fleeing.

\N<Training Troops Receptionist>As before, in order for you to fight on the stage of the
training troops assembly, we need to process a temporary
exemption for your husband Yuia's charges. Present the
relevant documents.

\N<Training Troops Receptionist>Hmm. You understand the obligations that have been imposed
upon you? As usual, first don the black garb and move to the
warriors' waiting room.

\N<Segi>...I understand. Both the obligations imposed upon me and
what I must do beyond that.

\N<Training Troops Receptionist>Hmm... Mind. Lyuda. With your body invaded by it, you're
doing well. Its effects are such that your reason and moral
sense can no longer control it.

\N<Training Troops Receptionist>But ironically, without the effects of that spirit medicine,
you wouldn't be able to survive this battle. Especially not
against someone like Zozoie.

\N<Training Troops Receptionist>Heh... The more you desire the power to fight, the more
reason you lose. Mind. Lyuda. In a way, you and that Zozoie
fellow are quite similar.

\N<Training Troops Receptionist>...Don't make such a face. Even if you are similar, the
driving force hidden in your heart is more noble than his.

\N<Man>To win in the training tournament, strength is of course
necessary, but knowledge of your opponents is absolutely
essential. It means you can't just win through brute force
alone.
